Change.Title: Renamed GradientToMagnitudeImageFilter to VectorMagnitudeImageFilter
Change.Author: David Doria
Change.Description:
GradientToMagnitudeImageFilter has been renamed to VectorMagnitudeImageFilter. It has been moved from the ImageGradient module to the ImageIntensity module. GradientToMagnitudeImageFilter has been made a subclass of VectorMagnitudeImageFilter and moved to the Deprecated module.
The majority of the changed files were tests which used GradientToMagnitudeImageFilter internally.
